appPublicIPDnsName.value: <dns name for the frontend load balancer> e.g. mytestvmdns

servicePublicIPDnsName.value: <dns name for the backend/service load balancer> e.g. appwcfdns

reference.secretName: <keyvalut secret to store the admin password> e.g. VMSSAdminPass

certificateStore.value: <certificate store name on the target vm> e.g. myPfxCert2

certificateDomain.value: <fully qualified domain name for which the certificate is installed> e.g. www.mycompany.com or *.mycompany.com for wildcard domains

vaultResourceGroup.value: <azure keyvalut resource group name> e.g. myKeyVault-rg

httpssecretUrlWithVersion.value: <uri with version of the pfx cert secret> e.g https://mykeyvault.vault.azure.net/secrets/myPfxCert2/11f95456772549a2b6b0ba38bd1b319a

httpssecretCaUrlWithVersion.value: <uri with version of the pfx cert secret> e.g https://mykeyvault.vault.azure.net/secrets/myPfxCert2/11f95456772549a2b6b0ba38bd1b319a
